Science Working Groups

$$ s = \int y^2 dy $$ SWMLV science is organized into seven working groups:

  • The Solar Neighborhood
  • Star Clusters
  • Variable Stars
  • The Galactic Bulge
  • Galactic Structure and ISM
  • Magellanic Clouds
  • Near Field Cosmology
